author: CmsHI
body:
Two bugfixes:
- Added missing boost direction in the asymmetric pA system, clarified names of corresponding VtxSmeared scenarios.
- In gen-filtering, the filter should apply after the boost, therefore a customization function is needed to swap the order of VtxSmeared and filter.
  by @MiheeJo @mandrenguyen
title: Bug-fix for rapidity filtering in pA collisions
